item.title: Converting Active Directory Groups to Cloud-Only with ADGMS
item.description: If you find yourself creating and maintaining on-premises groups just so they will synchronize to your Azure tenant, it’s time to free yourself from this time-consuming and potentially risky outdated practice by converting them to cloud only. item.title: Everything Old Is New Again: Hardening the Trust Boundary of VBS Enclaves
item.description: Virtualization-Based Security (VBS) enclaves use the hypervisor’s virtual trust levels (VTLs) to isolate regions of memory and code execution within a user-mode process. This provides a powerful solution for trusted execution environments (TEE) that protects sensitive data, like encryption keys, from even malicious administrators. However, this also introduces a new trust boundary: one between the VTL1 enclave and the VTL0 host. This complicates things!
